effect.sun_moon: If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power. If the target moves before the user, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power. If the target moves before the user, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power. If the target moves before the user, this move will fail. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

short_effect.sun_moon: Uses the target’s move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Uses the target’s move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Uses the target’s move against it before it attacks, with power increased by half.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target’s intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn’t used first.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target’s intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn’t used first.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target’s intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn’t used first.
